text:
Looking for a developer who also can develop Pardot landing pages for freelance work with our agency.
• Experience creating landing pages for SaaS clients a plus.
• Must be a great communicator, can work on our PM platform, and knows how to work on agency projects (familiar with revision rounds, time tracking, how to deliver work).
• You can work from anywhere in the world, but must have 3 hrs overlap with Pacific Time zone 8a-5p for working hours.
Please DM with hourly rate and Pardot landing page examples.
I used to work with Steve before he started upcraft. Solid and very knowledgeable!  I'd look here: <https://upcraft.io|https://upcraft.io>
